message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120. I hope this works for you.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my original price.  Would you consider $125?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am willing to pay $120 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
